publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4149 Margaret Mitchell: 70th Anniversary of the Royal Gibraltar Regimentâ€”That the Parliament notes that the Royal Gibraltar Regiment will fire the guns at Edinburgh Castle on Tuesday 2 June 2009 to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the regiment; further notes that this celebration pays tribute to the association that Gibraltar has enjoyed with many Scottish regiments; congratulates the Royal Gibraltar Regiment on its 70th anniversary, and wishes the regiment every success for the next 70 years.
